title: FINALS ARE FINALLY HERE! WHO'S GONNA WIN?!
body:
Hey
Just answer the question
I'm sad that Fnatic lost ;-; (RIP the dream)

I'm trying to do a whole region vote so please tell ur friends to vote!!!!

replies.body:
I love an underdog story so I'll be cheering for KOO.

Sad that neither of the EU teams got through, but I am pretty damn excited to see Smeb vs Marin!
This year's final prob is the most boring World finals.

> [{quoted}](name=Kenjishin,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A2JUqodB,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-10-27T00:43:34.586+0000)
>
> This year's final prob is the most boring World finals.

Little disappointing that its Korea V Korea. Should be good to watch the top lane match up though.

SKT should take it out 3-0. Koo struggles in the early game, SKT will exploit it and should snowball the game there. 
Smeb has a larger champ pool than Marin so should make top lane interesting. Faker will have something up his sleeve, I can't see him just playing Ryze.

TSM TSM TSM TSM TSM TSM

Loljk The Koreans will take it home this year......

LOLJK Faker will win it for sure....

LOLOLJK Crumbz will win the whole world (was that too far?)

No I think SKT's got it in the bag. Does anyone know if Riot will make another 5 SKT skins?
I'm 100% in the knockout stage atm so far, and well, I said KOO tigers will win, so if my track record means anything, it will prove that koo tigers will win, so fck your vote.
Knockout stage or the whole thing?
I'll go for KOO. Simply because ZAC was played.

Hoping SKT will win. I don't watch any other leagues beside the local OPL, so the only teams I knew were SKT, EDG, and FNC. I picked SKT to win worlds, while being with EDG in the final. I got all the quarter finals wrong except SKT so yeah, I want MOAR POINTS
lol i have been going for Skt T1 since the start and now this is what has become of them :) so happy!
I say SKT1 but since they have already won a worlds I hope KOO wins.
I had Fnatic in the finals and now I see that they didn't make it? God bless now I won't get full points.

> [{quoted}](name=Zen Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A2JUqodB,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-25T22:54:19.965+0000)

> I'm sad that Fnatic lost ;-; (RIP the dream)

I feel you!

I believe SKT will win. However I will be going for Koo. Smeb the king!

I'm Sorry, is this even a question? 

SKT <3
I want KOO to win. It should be a close one though, either way it goes!
I'm 100% in the knockout stage atm so far, and well, I said KOO tigers will win, so if my track record means anything, it will prove that koo tigers will win, so fuck your vote.
